experiences.name: Frontend Developer Intern
experiences.content: For the first half of the internship, I took part in data analysis on 6 different buildings in Central, Hong Kong. I gained experience in generating data reports. For the second half of the internship, I returned to my original role for web development. I assisted in the development of private websites for 2 of the mentioned 6 buildings, and display the data trends of each sensor within a period of time. I gained advanced knowledge in web development and project.
experiences.tools: Data Science: DBeaver, Anaconda, Pycharm, Jupyter Notebook. Web Development: GitHub, Laragon, Vue CLI, Plotly.js, Vue.js. Project Management: Slack, Notion

homepage.text: I am a student enrolled in the Computer Engineering programme of the Chinese University of Hong Kong.

interests.name: Drums
interests.description: I have 15 years of experience in drumming, and I recieved the certificate of Grade 8 in drums with distinction by Trinity College London (Rock and Pop). My focus is on progressive rock and punk rock music, which emphasizes on the power, speed and accuracy. I have done drum covers of Rush and Green Day, which suits my drumming style.

interests.name: Football
interests.description: I have watched football for 17 years, playing it for 8 years. I play as a centre back, and my strengths are tackling, interceptions and headers. My style of play is very aggressive and ruthless which frequently resulted in fouls. I am an avid supporter of Chelsea F.C and my football idols include John Terry, Tony Adams and Paolo Maldini.

interests.name: WWII History
interests.description: I am deeply interested in war history, particularly between the period of 1914-1945. I would do research on Adolf Hitler, the greatest of evil in the 21st century, and look into the roots of his ideals and how he created a murderous regime. These readings enhances my logical reasoning and critical thinking, and learn not to seperate the intertwined relationship between political, social, and economic aspects of every decision.

interests.name: Programming
interests.description: Since the start of college, I have invested a lot of time in programming. I learnt the basic concepts of Python and Java, and I have self-taught HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I enjoy the process of breaking down a problematic idea into small chunks, and when I solve them, I feel very motivated. I am currently learning advanced JavaScript and will take classes of C++ for my bachelors degree.

introduction.text: I am a year 2 student currently enrolled in the Associate of Engineering (Computer Science) from HKU SPACE. I have been admitted to the Bachelor of Engineering (Computer Engineering) programme of CUHK for the upcoming semester. I take pleasure from web development, having hands-on experience on web development in the last summer at Carnot Innovations Limited. I would also like to take part in other roles in the IT industry, primarily related to software engineering. I have acquired several important skills through my internship and projects, including UX/UI design for web and mobile users, and intermediate levels on the usage of NoSQL databases and REST APIs. Though I have experience in frontend design, I would also like to get my hands on backend operations. I have several hobbies, including playing football, drums (achieving Trinity College Rock & Pop grade 8 pass with distinction), and reading books on 1914-1945 war history.

projects.name: YouTeam - Team Management for YouTuber Groups
projects.description: A final-year project as a CS student at HKU SPACE. The website focuses on the usages of Vue.js, Firebase, Plotly.js, and YouTube Data API. Gained intermediate experience with authentication, NoSQL databases, state management, RESTful API, and web hosting.

projects.name: Simple Reaction Timer
projects.description: A simple reaction timer for me to learn/refresh the features of Vue 3. This project mainly displays my skills on event handling, where users can react at different intervals to get different results popped up on the screen.

projects.name: File Reader
projects.description: A page for users to import Excel or CSV files and display basic details in a data table
